display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=dcdcIhMAOCsQ7kNvwEH6d2Y&_nc_oc=AdlUICO2AHd0BaoAXRv7aMhrIT2pvrmTugT6-2TPjcEYbhj-6lLX84h-H6fDPlTKKiU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3VCxsbLzyBMmBEh9RUowLQ&oh=00_AfpFXeUH8QzwVDiWcgXfom0AqAUazJKyQfIFvdxWBFL4mg&oe=6962CA1D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=uoMKZC90pp0Q7kNvwFdJ6Hf&_nc_oc=Adkg83H4v5f8CBQV4Be8-mZPD2FqqA8z-wraVcxkbWYwYSlWM1QbCisi-Y658wQuD60&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3VCxsbLzyBMmBEh9RUowLQ&oh=00_AfoM3-ka3dfXx_u53w_ACTw4NYgpLGTUaMPJO6dkN_3lVg&oe=6962E412)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Yl5QpGD7bg0Q7kNvwGeLzIT&_nc_oc=AdntTJcfnehsS7whrPwyv3dl6ue6Bki01WwS1bNSyuzuOi8ezYQFXsq4TCPJygz-SEQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3VCxsbLzyBMmBEh9RUowLQ&oh=00_Afp59gcURm36ilnOaM_suzqwJwXXNaKIid0WuUafqN7xBw&oe=6962EA23)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=tWAXJx6GIXgQ7kNvwHIVoiJ&_nc_oc=AdlWWDVkeMsAfekc4sbSHYdGxeY_70biJXcnvBM-VQ8SNcgHQ7hVFSnTiHp5i_2iCYs&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3VCxsbLzyBMmBEh9RUowLQ&oh=00_AfrM2Fbbz4GQ7Wv3lKr4r-cfVwKQ2Xg7QC8YKcKETaaDGQ&oe=6962E0AE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=jv9tq0mmYqoQ7kNvwHf0xXo&_nc_oc=AdlEqR5EOQ6Y2khYCupVzcTTeeTei9dptNkYyR-sGW3h5wuK5SHlzh9mqtXLC71wxPc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3VCxsbLzyBMmBEh9RUowLQ&oh=00_AfrGtFLMh6N4t-DgGh8_Js9lVhfQB2GHYSMGhBpTRwD82g&oe=6962E896)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
